description: Lucas Entertainment’s new exclusive Mexican model Derek Allan has an incredible smile, which is a nice compliment to an overall hot package. With that in mind, you can’t go wrong with pairing him up with Massimo Piano, who has a perfect amount for Derek to suck on. If you’re looking for top-only Massimo action, your search is over. Need an example: take a look at 17:20. Derek Allan looks like he was born to ride the raw uncut cock of Massimo Piano!
title: Derek Allan Rides Massimo Piano’s Raw Uncut Cock
